00025 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( ParameterNameValueControlVocabularyTest );
00026 
00027 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_parameter;
00028 using namespace std;

00032 }

00034 void ParameterNameValueControlVocabularyTest::tearDown()

00037 
00038 void ParameterNameValueControlVocabularyTest::test_assignment()
00039 {
00040         ParameterNameValueControlVocabulary param1;
00041         ParameterNameValueControlVocabulary param2;
00042         wstring name = L"name";
00043         wstring value = L"value";
00044         wstring control1 = L"control1";
00045         wstring control2 = L"control2";
00046 
00047         param1.Name = name;
00048         param1.Value = value;
00049         param1.ControlledVocabulary.push_back(control1);
00050         param1.ControlledVocabulary.push_back(control2);
00051 
00052         param2 = param1;
00053 
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param2.Name == param1.Name );
00055         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param2.Value == param1.Value );
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param2.ControlledVocabulary[0] == param1.ControlledVocabulary[0] );
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param2.ControlledVocabulary[1] == param1.ControlledVocabulary[1] );
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param2.ControlledVocabulary.size() == param1.ControlledVocabulary.size() );
00059 }
00060 
00061 void ParameterNameValueControlVocabularyTest::test_equality_to_other_object()
00062 {
00063         ParameterNameValueControlVocabulary param1;
00064         ParameterNameValueControlVocabulary param2;
00065         wstring name = L"name";
00066         wstring value = L"value";
00067 
00068         param1.Name = name;
00069         param1.Value = value;
00070 
00071         param2.Name = name;
00072         param2.Value = value;
00073 
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param2 == param1 );
00075 }
00076 
00077 void ParameterNameValueControlVocabularyTest::test_equality_to_string()
00078 {
00079         ParameterNameValueControlVocabulary param;
00080         wstring name = L"name";
00081         wstring value = L"value";
00082 
00083         param.Name = name;
00084         param.Value = value;
00085 
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param == name );
00087 }
00088 
00089 void ParameterNameValueControlVocabularyTest::test_accessibility()
00090 {
00091         ParameterNameValueControlVocabulary param;
00092         wstring name = L"name";
00093         wstring value = L"value";
00094         wstring control1 = L"control1";
00095         wstring control2 = L"control2";
00096 
00097         param.Name = name;
00098         param.Value = value;
00099         param.ControlledVocabulary.push_back(control1);
00100         param.ControlledVocabulary.push_back(control2);
00101 
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param.Name == name );
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param.Value == value );
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param.ControlledVocabulary[0] == control1 );
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( param.ControlledVocabulary[1] == control2 );
00106 
00107 }
